name: SetOnCallTeamRoutingRules
description:
Set or update a team's On-Call routing rules in Datadog.

Use this tool to configure or modify the On-Call routing rules for a specific team in Datadog.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team whose routing rules are being set. It should be a string.

parameters.name: routing_rules_request_data
parameters.description: JSON payload for creating or updating routing rules, including rule attributes, ID, and type.

actions.description: Specifies the list of actions to perform when the routing rule is matched.

policy_id.description: Identifies the policy to be applied when this routing rule matches.

query.description: Defines the query or condition that triggers this routing rule.

end_time.description: Specifies the ending time for this restriction.

start_time.description: Specifies the starting time for this restriction.

restrictions.description: Defines the list of time-based restrictions.

time_zone.description: Specifies the time zone applicable to the restrictions.

time_restriction.description: Holds time zone information and a list of time restrictions for a routing rule.

urgency.description: Specifies the level of urgency for a routing rule (low, high, or dynamic).

rules.description: A list of routing rule items that define how incoming pages should be handled.

attributes.description: Represents the attributes of a request to update or create team routing rules.

id.description: Specifies the unique identifier for this set of team routing rules.

data.description: Holds the data necessary to create or update team routing rules, including attributes, ID, and resource type.

parameters.name: include_relationships
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of relationships to include in the response. Allowed: `rules`, `rules.policy`.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of included relationships to be returned. Allowed values: `rules`, `rules.policy`.
